page.title: 07FIELDNAMES.
page.content:
The names of local fields are a rich source of interest and current and historical information. Here is a selection of field names:-
Slick woods, Furney piece, Out-lit, White leasowe, The Den, Bannet tree, The patch, Rick yard, Long batches, Coppy field, Love lane, Ash beds, Hangmans, Englands meadow, Harps, Bricklees, Linglies, Lazies, Millfield, Goosefoot, Crows ash, Pear tree, Billies, Long ground, Stockall, Coal pit, Tilehouse, Oozy, Spring meadow, Church meadows, Topside, Cow pasture, Banky field, North field,
